ARTICLE.TITLE: Trump issues orders banning TikTok and WeChat from operating in 45 days if they are not sold by Chinese parent companies
ARTICLE.TEXT: Trump issues orders banning TikTok and WeChat from operating in 45 days if they are not sold by Chinese parent companies

METADATA.keywords: tiktok, executive order, politics, computer science, software, ministries, application software, bytedance ltd., freeware, mobile applications, social networking services, video software, donald trump, app, concern, commerce, economics
METADATA.news_keywords: tiktok, executive order, politics, computer science, software, ministries, application software, bytedance ltd., freeware, mobile applications, social networking services, video software, donald trump, app, concern, commerce, economics
METADATA.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday issued an executive order that would ban the social media app TikTok from operating in the US in 45 days if it is not sold
METADATA.author: Nikki Carvajal and Caroline Kelly, CNN

og.title: Trump issues orders banning TikTok and WeChat from operating in 45 days if they are not sold by Chinese parent companies
og.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday issued an executive order that would ban the social media app TikTok from operating in the US in 45 days if it is not sold
